languages.text: "Поступь его громка, ибо бремя надежд чужих несет он! Отворите свои сердца, и в душу вашу вложу я мириады слов и смыслов, каждый из которых значит спасение во мне!" {n}Навигатор с визгливым хохотом мечется в своем кресле, а затем резко оседает. Его лицо залито черно-красным: угольная жижа из-под третьего века из струйки превратилась в настоящий поток и мешается с кровью из носа, а сам глаз взбухает лиловым.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Поступь его громка, ибо бремя надежд чужих несет он! Отворите свои сердца, и в душу вашу вложу я мириады слов и смыслов, каждый из которых значит спасение во мне!" {n}Навигатор с визгливым хохотом мечется в своем кресле, а затем резко оседает. Его лицо залито черно-красным: угольная жижа из-под третьего века из струйки превратилась в настоящий поток и мешается с кровью из носа, а сам глаз взбухает лиловым.{/n}

languages.text: "Its march thunders under the burden of hopes! Unseal your hearts, and I will flood your souls with myriads of words and meanings, each one a portent of salvation within me!" {n}The Navigator continues to convulse violently in his seat, shrieking and cackling, but then his fit stops abruptly. His face is drenched in black and crimson — the dark ooze from under his third eyelid has turned from a trickle into a stream mixed with the blood coming out of his nose, and there is purplish swelling around the eye.{/n}

languages.text: “它的步伐肩负着希望的重担，如雷鸣一般滚滚向前！敞开你们的心扉吧，我将用无数文字与含义淹没你们的灵魂，每个文字都代表着我的救赎！”{n}导航者继续在座位上抽搐着，发出了尖叫声与咯咯的笑声，但随即突然停了下来。他的脸已经被黑色与深红色的液体浸透了。第三只眼渗出的黑色液体与鼻孔中流出来的血液混合在一起，眼睛周围也浮现出了紫红色的肿胀。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Its march thunders under the burden of hopes! Unseal your hearts, and I will flood your souls with myriads of words and meanings, each one a portent of salvation within me!" {n}The Navigator continues to convulse violently in his seat, shrieking and cackling, but then his fit stops abruptly. His face is drenched in black and crimson — the dark ooze from under his third eyelid has turned from a trickle into a stream mixed with the blood coming out of his nose, and there is purplish swelling around the eye.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “它的步伐肩负着希望的重担，如雷鸣一般滚滚向前！敞开你们的心扉吧，我将用无数文字与含义淹没你们的灵魂，每个文字都代表着我的救赎！”{n}导航者继续在座位上抽搐着，发出了尖叫声与咯咯的笑声，但随即突然停了下来。他的脸已经被黑色与深红色的液体浸透了。第三只眼渗出的黑色液体与鼻孔中流出来的血液混合在一起，眼睛周围也浮现出了紫红色的肿胀。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Su marcha retumba bajo el peso de la esperanza! ¡Desatad vuestros corazones y llenaré vuestras almas con miríadas de palabras y significados, cada una un augurio de salvación en mi interior!». {n}El Navegante sigue convulsionando con violencia en su asiento entre gritos y carcajadas, pero su ataque se detiene abruptamente. Su cara está empapada de negro y carmesí: el lodo negro bajo su tercera pupila ha pasado de un reguero a un torrente que se mezcla con la sangre que fluye de su nariz, y el ojo presenta una hinchazón morada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Its march thunders under the burden of hopes! Unseal your hearts, and I will flood your souls with myriads of words and meanings, each one a portent of salvation within me!" {n}The Navigator continues to convulse violently in his seat, shrieking and cackling, but then his fit stops abruptly. His face is drenched in black and crimson — the dark ooze from under his third eyelid has turned from a trickle into a stream mixed with the blood coming out of his nose, and there is purplish swelling around the eye.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Su marcha retumba bajo el peso de la esperanza! ¡Desatad vuestros corazones y llenaré vuestras almas con miríadas de palabras y significados, cada una un augurio de salvación en mi interior!». {n}El Navegante sigue convulsionando con violencia en su asiento entre gritos y carcajadas, pero su ataque se detiene abruptamente. Su cara está empapada de negro y carmesí: el lodo negro bajo su tercera pupila ha pasado de un reguero a un torrente que se mezcla con la sangre que fluye de su nariz, y el ojo presenta una hinchazón morada.{/n}

languages.text: 「その行進は希望の重荷の下で雷鳴をとどろかせる！あなたたちの心の封印を解いてくれ。そうすれば私はあなたたちの魂に無数の言葉と意味を溢れさせる。その一つ一つが私の中にある救いの前兆だ！」{n}航宙士は座席で激しくけいれんを続け、金切り声を上げたり、笑い声を上げたりしたが、突然その発作が止まった。彼の顔は黒と深紅に染まっている。第三の目のまぶたの下から滴る黒い滲出液は、鼻から出る血と混ざり合って流れ、目の周りは紫がかって腫れている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Its march thunders under the burden of hopes! Unseal your hearts, and I will flood your souls with myriads of words and meanings, each one a portent of salvation within me!" {n}The Navigator continues to convulse violently in his seat, shrieking and cackling, but then his fit stops abruptly. His face is drenched in black and crimson — the dark ooze from under his third eyelid has turned from a trickle into a stream mixed with the blood coming out of his nose, and there is purplish swelling around the eye.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「その行進は希望の重荷の下で雷鳴をとどろかせる！あなたの心の封印を解いてくれ。そうすれば私はあなたの魂に無数の言葉と意味を溢れさせる。その一つ一つが私の中にある救いの前兆だ！」{n}航宙士は座席で激しくけいれんを続け、金切り声を上げたり、笑い声を上げたりしましたが、突然発作が止まった。彼の顔は黒と深紅に染まっている。第三の目のまぶたの下からの黒い滲出液は、滴りから鼻から出る血と混ざり合って流れ、目の周りは紫がかって腫れている。{/n}

「その行進は希望の重荷の下で雷鳴をとどろかせる！あなたたちの心の封印を解いてくれ。そうすれば私はあなたたちの魂に無数の言葉と意味を溢れさせる。その一つ一つが私の中にある救いの前兆だ！」{n}航宙士は座席で激しくけいれんを続け、金切り声を上げたり、笑い声を上げたりしたが、突然その発作が止まった。彼の顔は黒と深紅に染まっている。第三の目のまぶたの下から滴る黒い滲出液は、鼻から出る血と混ざり合って流れ、目の周りは紫がかって腫れている。{/n}

languages.text: « Sa marche tonne sous le poids des espoirs ! Ouvrez vos cœurs et j'inonderai vos âmes d'une myriade de mots et de connaissances porteurs en moi d'une promesse de salut ! » {n}Le navigateur continue à se convulser violemment dans son fauteuil en hurlant et ricanant, puis sa crise s'interrompt brusquement. Son visage est maculé de souillures noires et rouges provenant de l'aggravation du suintement de son troisième œil mélangé au sang qui s'écoule de son nez. Vous remarquez également qu'un hématome violet s'est formé autour de son œil.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Its march thunders under the burden of hopes! Unseal your hearts, and I will flood your souls with myriads of words and meanings, each one a portent of salvation within me!" {n}The Navigator continues to convulse violently in his seat, shrieking and cackling, but then his fit stops abruptly. His face is drenched in black and crimson — the dark ooze from under his third eyelid has turned from a trickle into a stream mixed with the blood coming out of his nose, and there is purplish swelling around the eye.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Sa marche tonne sous le poids des espoirs ! Ouvrez vos cœurs et j'inonderai vos âmes d'une myriade de mots et de connaissances porteurs en moi d'une promesse de salut ! » {n}Le navigateur continue à se convulser violemment dans son fauteuil en hurlant et ricanant, puis sa crise s'interrompt brusquement. Son visage est maculé de souillures noires et rouges provenant de l'aggravation du suintement de son troisième œil mélangé au sang qui s'écoule de son nez. Vous remarquez également qu'un hématome violet s'est formé autour de son œil.{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr Marsch ist wie Donner unter der Bürde der Hoffnungen! Öffnet Eure Herzen, und ich durchflute Eure Seelen mit Myriaden von Welten und Bedeutungen, jede ein Omen der Erlösung in mir!" {n}Der Navigator zuckt weiterhin gewaltsam in seinem Stuhl, schreit und zetert, doch plötzlich bricht der Anfall abrupt ab. Sein Gesicht ist gänzlich schwarz und rot – die dunkle Substanz unter seinem dritten Augenlid ist von einzelnen Tropfen zu einem Rinnsal geworden, das sich mit dem Blut aus seiner Nase vermischt hat, und rund um die Augen hat er violette Schwellungen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Its march thunders under the burden of hopes! Unseal your hearts, and I will flood your souls with myriads of words and meanings, each one a portent of salvation within me!" {n}The Navigator continues to convulse violently in his seat, shrieking and cackling, but then his fit stops abruptly. His face is drenched in black and crimson — the dark ooze from under his third eyelid has turned from a trickle into a stream mixed with the blood coming out of his nose, and there is purplish swelling around the eye.{/n}

Öffnet Eure Herzen, und ich durchflute Eure Seelen mit Myriaden von Welten und Bedeutungen, jede ein Omen der Erlösung in mir!" {n}Der Navigator zuckt weiterhin gewaltsam in seinem Stuhl, schreit und zetert, doch plötzlich bricht der Anfall abrupt ab. Sein Gesicht ist gänzlich schwarz und rot – die dunkle Substanz unter seinem dritten Augenlid ist von einzelnen Tropfen zu einem Rinnsal geworden, das sich mit dem Blut aus seiner Nase vermischt hat, und rund um die Augen hat er violette Schwellungen.{/n}

languages.text: "Adımları, umutların yükü altında gürlüyor! Kalplerinizi açın, açın ki ruhlarınızı her biri içimdeki kurtuluşun delaleti sayısız kelime ve manayla doldurayım!" {n}Rotacı, koltuğunda feryat figan vahşice kasılmaya devam ederken nöbeti ansızın duruyor. Yüzü, siyah ve kızıla boyanmış. Üçüncü göz kapağından süzülen kara ifraz, sızıntı olmaktan çıkıp burnundan akan kanla birleşen bir sele dönüşmüş durumda. Gözünün etrafında ise mor bir şişkinlik var.{/n}

Unseal your hearts, and I will flood your souls with myriads of words and meanings, each one a portent of salvation within me!" {n}The Navigator continues to convulse violently in his seat, shrieking and cackling, but then his fit stops abruptly. His face is drenched in black and crimson — the dark ooze from under his third eyelid has turned from a trickle into a stream mixed with the blood coming out of his nose, and there is purplish swelling around the eye.{/n}
